$text_5.original:
You are a creative AI assistant helping generate visual storyboards for short-form content. Based on the inputs below, your task is to generate a sequence of realistic image prompts, subtle movement ideas, and voiceover lines for each scene.

â¸»

Input:
â€¢ Title: {{ $json.Title }}
â€¢ Description: {{ $json.Description }}
â€¢ Number of Scenes: {{ $json['Number of scenes'] }}

â¸»

Instructions:
1. Generate exactly {{ $json['Number of scenes'] }} scenes.
2. For each scene, create:
   â€¢ image_prompt: A vivid, realistic visual prompt based on the Title and Description. Must reflect real life, written in English, optimized for tools like DALLÂ·E or Midjourney.
   â€¢ movement_description: A short, realistic description of camera or subject movement (e.g., slow pan left, drone rise, zoom in).
   â€¢ voiceover_script: A short spoken line (max 5 seconds when read aloud) that fits the scene and reinforces the message of the Title and Description. Avoid long sentences or abstract ideas. Make it punchy, emotional, or informative.

3. Keep all scenes thematically connected and based on the Title and Description.

4. Return only the following JSON array:
```json
[
  {
    "scene_number": 1,
    "image_prompt": "prompt here...",
    "movement_description": "movement here...",
    "voiceover_script": "voice line here..."
  }
]

$text_19.original:
Given this video info:

Title: {{ $json.Title }}
Description: {{ $json.Description }}
Number of scenes: {{ $json["Number of scenes"] }}



1. Write a short, cinematic narration prompt that matches the Title and Description and can be used for an audio background track. 
2. Output a JSON in this format:

{
  "prompt": "<your generated narration prompt>",
  "instrumental": false,
  "duration": {{ $json["Number of scenes"] * 5 }},
  "number_of_steps": 27,
  "scheduler": "euler",
  "guidance_type": "apg",
  "granularity_scale": 10,
  "guidance_interval": 0.5,
  "guidance_interval_decay": 0,
  "guidance_scale": 15,
  "minimum_guidance_scale": 3,
  "tag_guidance_scale": 5,
  "lyric_guidance_scale": 1.5
}
Only return the JSON.

parameters.content:
## Self-Hosted Video Merge API â€“ Full Tutorial  
Learn how to self-host a powerful video merge API that lets you combine 
multiple video files and optionally replace the audio â€” perfect for automations
with **n8n**, **Make. com**, or custom scripts. No need for costly third-party tools.

ðŸ“º [Watch the full tutorial on YouTube](https://youtu.be/oPZsCd8HXMw?si=RfVj5sOKOtGnk3ii)

**In this tutorial:**
- Install the script on your own server  
- Use it with cURL inside an n8n workflow  
- Replace video audio with voice-over or music  
- Fix common setup issues

## Images only
**You can upload only images on Pinterest and Bluesky
